name: Mirror Mellow
description:
A puzzle adventure game that uses pieces to make its own level design.

The adventure of two mashmellows, in parallel universes that complement each other. This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2022, it was our first jam at this level and we are very proud of the result we achieved in 48hrs! With a random group of friends, we gathered in a house and magic happened. I hope you all enjoy it!

 Leave in the comments your oppinion!

Controls

WASD - Move;

Mouse - Move pieces;

Credits Artists
